thing-type.label: Notifications for Android TV Display Connection
thing-type.description: Notifications for Android TV is a Google Play store app by Christian Fees. Use this thing for each of your TV's that have this app installed and setup correctly.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Enter just the IP or Hostname without the port or http/s

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: This port will be used for sending messages to your TV.

parameter.name: pollTime
parameter.label: Poll Time
parameter.description: Time in seconds of how often to fetch the state of any settings and check if TV is turned on.

thing-type.label: Tv Overlay Display Connection
thing-type.description: TvOverlay is a Google Play store app by Tab Developer. Add one of these for each TV that is running the correctly setup and working app.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Enter just the IP or Hostname without the port or http/s

parameter.name: resendFixed
parameter.label: Resend Fixed Notifications
parameter.description: If set, will automatically re-send any fixed notifications when the TV comes back online. You can remove individual messages so they are not sent with visible=false and same ID.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: This port will be used for sending messages to your TV.

parameter.name: pollTime
parameter.label: Poll Time
parameter.description: Time in seconds of how often to fetch the state of any settings and check if TV is turned on.

channel-type.label: Fixed Notifications Visibility
channel-type.description: Change how transparent the fixed notifications are on the screen

channel-type.label: Overlay Visibility
channel-type.description: Change how transparent or dark the entire screen is through the use of a full screen black background

channel-type.label: Clock Overlay Visibility
channel-type.description: Change how transparent the clock is on the screen

channel-type.label: Hot Corner
channel-type.description: The corner used to display new messages in

channel-type.label: Display Corner
channel-type.description: The corner used to display new messages in

channel-type.label: Font Size
channel-type.description: How large to make the font in messages

channel-type.label: Notification Duration
channel-type.description: The duration the station will be opened the next time it is switched on.

channel-type.label: Display Fixed Notifications
channel-type.description: Whether or not the fixed notifications are displayed.

channel-type.label: Pixel Shift
channel-type.description: Whether to move the overlay every 2 minutes to avoid screen burn-in

channel-type.label: Display Notifications
channel-type.description: Whether or not the notifications are displayed.

channel-type.label: Background Color
channel-type.description: Allows you to change the background color for fixed notifications

channel-type.label: Send Test Notification
channel-type.description: Use this channel to test if the binding is talking to the app successfully.

channel-type.label: Send Notification
channel-type.description: Use this channel to send quick messages by changing the `default list item widget` to `input-list-item`, `text` as input type and enable the send button.
